title: How long does it take for Riot to respond to a Support Ticket I've had an open ticket for 3 days
body: It's been open for 3 days and I really want help, I cant even play the game with my current issue and I dont know what to do to solve this ;({{item:3070}}

replies.body: I was able to confirm that your ticket was received, and escalated to our tech team.  I do see that you recently replied to your ticket, but keep in mind doing that  can return you to the bottom of the queue until a specialist replied back.  If I can lend a suggestion here, you may want to go over the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide.  It sounds like either your drivers or the updated game files are failing to render, and may need to run some repairs.  Hang tight, and we'll help out as soon as we can!
